src_text: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
ref_text: Air prògram rèidio Sveriges san t-Suain Diluain, dh’fhoillsich Sara Danius, rùnaire maireannach Chomataidh Nobel airson Litreachais aig Acadamaidh na Suaine, gun do dh’fhairtlich air a’ chomataidh fios dìreach a chur gu Bob Dylan mu bhith buannachadh Duais Litreachais Nobel 2016 agus gun robh iad air an oidhirpean a leigeil seachad.
hyp_text: Air a' Mhàirt, Sara Danius, sgioba-riaghlaidh dìreach na Comataidh Nobel air Litreachas aig Acadamaidh na Suain, chuir am pàrlamaid air an t-saoghail air an t-sràid air Sveriges Radio ann an Sweden a-mhàin, gum bha iad air a bhith a' dol air ais air a' dèiligeadh ri Bob Dylan gu math tric airson a bhith a' fàgail an Duais Nobel ann an Litreachas na bliadhna 2016, air sgàth 's gun do thachair iad air a bhith a' lorg aige.

hyp_text: Thuirt Danius, 'Tha sinne an-dràs a' dèanamh rud beag. Chumail mi agus chuir mi e-mailichean a dh'fhear a tha na com-pàirteachaidh as aghmuis agus faodach mi freagairtean mòra-mòr a lorg. An-dràs, tha sin a bheil sin.

src_text: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
ref_text: Tha sinn ag aontachadh le aithris USOC gum faodadh e bhith air barrachd leas nan lùth-chleasaichean is clubaichean againn, agus an spòrs aca, ma ghluaiseas sinn air adhart le atharrachadh seaghail am broinn na buidhne againn, seach a bhith gar dì-theisteanachadh.
hyp_text: Tha sinn a' tòiseachd leis a' phrògram-chlàraidh USOC gum biodh freumhan na h-athletean againn is na cluban againn, agus an sport againn, nas fhasaiche air a bhith a' dol air adhart le atharrachadh meanmhach a tronghinn dhuinn, mura nach bi de-chertificàthain.

hyp_text: Tha USA Gymnastics agus an USOC a' faodachadh an aon ghual a dh'fhalbh — a' dèanamh an sport de dh'iomadh, 's eile, nas fhaide ri fhaicinn airson luchd-ionnsachaidh a' faodachadh a' dol a-steach a' phàirc aca ann an t-saoghal saor, poiseil 's cumhach.

src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Mar Chomhairleach Tèarainteachd Nàiseanta, chuidich e Carter le cùisean na cruinne a làimhseachadh le liut dioplòmasach a leithid Còrdaidhean Champa Dhàibhidh, 1978; àbhaisteachadh dàimhean nan SA–Sìona aig deireadh nan 1970an; aramach Ioràin a dh’adhbhraich càs bhràighdean-gill Ioràin, 1979; agus brùthadh nan Sovietach a-steach do dh’Afganastan, 1979.
hyp_text: Le NSA, thug e cuideachadh do Charteir airson cuid de na h-obrach-dìomhair a dh'fhalbh, mar aon a bh'anns an Chòmhraidhean David, 1978; a' faighinn a' chòmhraidh eadar Stàitean Aonaichte-Chàina airson na laethanta an dèidh 1970an; an Rèabhlaid Iranach, a chaidh gu crìoch an crìoch-phàirce a bh'anns an Iran, 1979; agus an cuairt-mhòrachaidh an t-Sòivéitich ann an Afganistan, 1979.

src_text: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
ref_text: Tha TMZ , làrach-lìn nan naidheachdan dibhearsanach, a’ tuigsinn gun do stad an dealbhadair an carbad aige taobh thall Sepulveda Boulevard agus dh’fheuch e ri dealbhan a thogail dhen stopadh poileis mus do ghabh e tarsaing air an rathad. Le sin, b’ fheudar don oifigear poileis a bha a’ stiùireadh an stopadh trafaige òrdan a thoirt dha tilleadh far an tàinig e, dà uair.
hyp_text: Tha làrach-lìn naidheachdan ealain TMZ a' faighinn a' dol gu bith an togalaichean a chuir e a char a tha air a' charraigean Sipeulveda agus a' gabhail pìosan-fhàinnean de na poileas airson na stòp a dh'fhalbh, nuair a bha e a' dol a-steach air an sgìre agus a' teachd a dh'fhalbh, a' dèiligeadh ri an oifigear poileas a' ràdh air a chur e air ais air an sgìre, dha-rìreabh.

hyp_text: Tha sgrìobhadairean bho Oilthigh Princeton nan Stàitean Aonaichte agus Oilthigh Uppsala na Suain anns an t-Suain a ràdh gun do dh'fhàs speuran ùra ann an dà ginealach, ged a bha e air a chur ri faicheadh gun do dh'fhalbh an t-sìth a bhith a' tòiseachadh a dh'fhalbh, air sgàth 's gun do dh'fhuirich eadar Geospiza fortes, an t-sìth-phinntach a th'ann an àite, agus Geospiza conirostris, an t-sìth-phinntach a thàinig.

src_text: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

hyp_text: Bha toileanannan ann cuideachd ann an Aegipt na h-atharrach, Pearsa agus Sìona. Ann an civilidheachd Ròmanach, bha toileanannan a’ fàs pàirt de dh’fhàiltean poblaireachd far an robh daoine nam fireann agus nam ban a’ dol ann an companaidh deimhinne.

src_text: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
ref_text: Chaidh an saideal a chur dhan fhànas air rocaid. Cleachdaidh an luchd-saidheans glainneachan-amhairc san fhànas a chionn ’s gu bheil àile na Talmhainn a’ claonadh cuid dhen t-solas agus dhen t-sealladh againn.

src_text: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
ref_text: Tha lirean de leòmhannan gu math coltach ri lomhainn mhadaidhean-allaidh no chon nan giùlan, beathaichean a tha, gu h-annasach, coltach ri leòmhannan (ach chan ann ri cait mhòra eile) nan giùlan agus cuideachd gu math marbhtach dhan chreach aca.
hyp_text: Tha prìth lion a’ cleachdadh a bhith mar pacaichean dòmhnallach na lùchairtean neo na cù, a’ chuid as motha a tha gu math air a chèile ri lùchairtean (gu dearra nach eil a’ bhuachaill eilean) a’ bith, agus cuideachd gu math doighlich do th’fhàinnean aca.

src_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
ref_text: S toil le osalotaichean beathaichean beaga ithe. Glacaidh iad muncaidhean, nathraichean, creimich agus eòin ma gheibh iad grèim orra. Tha cha mhòr gach beathach a shealgas an t-osalot fada nas lugha na e fhèin.
hyp_text: Tha ocealaidhean a’ dol gu bith dh’fhalbh beathaichean beaga. Cuiridh iad air mhuireagan, sgeolan, rèin-ghreine is eunanta mar a tha iad air a dèanamh. Tha na beathaichean a tha an ocealaidh a’ fuasgladh a’ fàgail gu math beag na tha iad a’ fàgail.

src_text: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.

src_text: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.

src_text: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
ref_text: Tha am facal sìobhaltas a’ tighinn on Laideann cīvīlis, a’ ciallachadh sìobhalta, co-cheangailte ris an Laideann cīvis, a’ ciallachadh saoranach, agus cīvitās, a’ ciallachadh baile no cathair-stàit, agus tha seo cuideachd a’ mìneachadh meud an t-sòisealtais.
hyp_text: Tha an fhacal 'civilization' a’ tòiseachadh bho 'civilis', a' meanm 'civile', a' bheil a' chiall ri 'civis', a' meanm 'ciotach', 'civitas', a' meanm 'bhaile no stàit bhaile, agus gu math nach eil a' dèanamh a' mheudachadh a' mhòr-chuid a' chuidachaidh a' chumhachaidh.

hyp_text: Tha 1624, chuir an Companaidh Eadailt na h-Indie a stèidheachadh air a' chladach deas na Tàiwàn, a' toirt atharrachadh air pràisean-làithean a' phròiseil na Gàidheal air a' mhuir, agus a' cleachdadh luchd-togalaichean Sìonaich air a' dol air a' phàrlamaid is a' phàrlamaid siùcar.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
ref_text: Tha riaghaltas nan Qing a’ cur ainm ri Cùmhnant Shimonoseki ann an 1895 an dèidh dhaibh a’ chiad chogadh eadar an t-Sìn is an t-Seapan a chall (1894-1895) agus ghèill seo flaitheas thar Taidh-Bhàn dhan t-Seapan a riaghlaich an t-eilean gu 1945.
hyp_text: Anns a’ bhliadhna 1895, an dèidh dèanamh a-mach ann an Cogadh Sìneach-Iapanach a’ Mhòir (1894-1895), dh’fhoillseachas riaghaltas an t-Sìne an Conaidh Shimonoseki, leis gum do chuir e às doimhneachd air Taiwan gu Iapan, a dh’fhàgail an eilean gu 1945.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
ref_text: Chan fhaicear rud sam bith ach an t-adhar soilleir gu h-àrd agus an iomadh beinn a tha ga chuairteachadh. Chan fhaicear is cha chluinnear ach glè bheag den t-saoghal seo bho thaobh a-staigh na h-uamha.
hyp_text: Chan eil rud sam bith a dh’fhaodas a sheachadh ach an t-siùil glè bhreac is an t-saoghal math is àrd a tha faisg, is tha an t-saoghail a tha seo air an t-saoghail an-diugh a dh’fhaodas a sheachadh no a chluinn agus tha an ciste a tha romham a’ dol a bhith a’ fàgail an t-saoghail a tha seo.

hyp_text: Tha an Làraichean Ghiza, no 'Làraichean Ghiza' anns an Ghàidheal Eipheit, a' gabhail a-steach beathaichean mòra (a tha an phrìomh phrìomh-phrìomh na mòra), beathaichean beaga, teampallan, agus a' Sheinphs mòr.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

hyp_text: Tha dèumannan-teicneòlachd a' ciallachadh teirm a tha a' cumail a' mhòran de dh'fhìdeachan ann an pràsdach, bho dèumannan-teicneòlachd no dèumannan-teicneòlachd gu smaoineachd a tha a' dol a-mach gu fàgail a' chùis gu bheil an t-saorsa dha na duine air a bhith a' dol a-mach le rìreabh-saorsa a tha a' buntainn ris na h-oideanan-saorsa is a' chuid a th'air a chur air bhog ann an teicneòlachd.

hyp_text: Tha a dh'fhàgail a stàit a dhèanamh air ais an dèanamaid an dàrna linn a chaidh, air sgàth nach do chaidh na Crusadaich air ais a' toirt airson sàilleachd a bhith a' toirt airson siolcas agus spìs a bha a' faodadh a bhith a' fàgail na mòran nas fhaide na bha na margaidean Byzantine a' tabhann.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: Tha tuathanachas bith-beò na rian sìmplidh, gu math tric organach, a chleachdas sìl a bhuineas dhan èico-sgìre còmhla ri cuairteachadh-barra no dòighean gu math sìmplidh eile airson toradh cho mòr ’s a ghabhas fhaighinn.
hyp_text: Tha feòladh-bhàtaichean a bhith air a dèanamh le ràdharc sam bith, a bhith a' cleachdadh siùil eadar-dhealaichte a tha na dhùthcha, a' gabhail a-steach rèòl-mhàilean no teicnicanan eile a tha gu math beag a dh'fhalbh, airson a dh'fhalbh a bhith a' fàs a' mòran.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga.

hyp_text: Tha Budhachas Tibiteach a stèidheachadh air thagraidhean Bhuddhach, ach chaidh i a leasachadh le beatha Mahaiana agus le mòran teagmhachdan bhon Yòga Ind-Àiteach.

src_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
ref_text: Is e Iòga Diadhachd am prìomh mheadhan Tibeiteach air meòrachadh. Le diofar dhiathan a thoirt fa chomhair inntinn, thèid na seanailean lùtha a ghlanadh às, na chakrathan a spreigeadh agus mothachadh soillseachaidh a chruthachadh.
hyp_text: Tha ceann a’ Ghaelachais Tìbeteach a’ bhith na Deachd Yoga. Tron dhòigh-chomhairleachadh de dh’fhàgail de dh’fhàgail tha an t-èirigh a’ fàgail, tha na chakraichean a’ fàgail agus a’ chruthachadh a’ chòmhraidheachd eòlachaidh.

src_text: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.

hyp_text: Bha an Ghearmailt na chèile a charaichean aig an Dàrna Cogadh Mhòir, a' toirt co-obrachadh eadar an t-Aonaidh Sobhiat agus na Stàitean Aonaichte. Le tòiseachadh an cogaidh, chaidh an t-siostam, an t-obraiche agus an cultar a dh'fhàgail a' chuidichean a' falbh.

src_text: The first known transportation was walking, humans began walking upright two million years ago with the emergence of Homo Erectus (meaning upright man).
ref_text: S e coiseachd a’ chiad ghiùlan a dh’èirich cho fad ’s fhios dhuinn, thòisich an cinne-daonna air coiseachd air an dà chas dà mhillean bliadhna air ais nuair a nochd homo erectus (a’ ciallachadh duine ceann-dìreach).
hyp_text: Tha an t-aonach a tha a' dol a' toirt fàs a dh'fhalbh, bhon a thòisich daoine a dol a-steach air a' chùlaibh, le èimhleadh Homo Erectus (a' meanmnaich a' dol a-steach), gun do thòisich iad a dol a-steach air a' chùlaibh mu mhìle air a dh'fhàgail.

hyp_text: Tha speisealan dà-shùile a chòrdadh ann an fosilean an t-Sualantropus bho 4.2-3.9 millean air ais, ged nach do dh'fhàs Sahelanthropus air dà shùile aig àm a tha air a dèanamh seach 7 millean air ais.

hyp_text: Rithmeanan sam bith, a tha nach eil air a dèanamh na freagaradh air cuideigin a chuir meanan sam bith a-muigh, tha aithne air a bhith aithne air a chuid as motha de na h-ainmhidhean beatha, a h-uile, a tha na bactairean, fungi, planagan, is ainmhidhean.

src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Chaidh am baile ris an canar Casablanca an-diugh a stèidheachadh le iasgairean Berber san 10mh linn RC. Chuirte gu feum e le Phoenesianich, Ròmanaich, agus sluagh Mherenid mar bhaile-puirt cudromach ris a chante Anfa.
hyp_text: Tha am bailteas àiteanach Casablanca na làtraich a stèidhich na Lèodha Berber aig àm a’ chiad leth-ghaoil ro Chriosda, agus bha e air a chleachd leis na Phoinicianaich, na Ròmanach, agus nan Mherenaidh mar phort-stràiteach a tha air a cleachdadh Anfa.

src_text: Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.
ref_text: Tha e furasta àitichean a lorg a reiceas bathar tradaiseanta Morocach mun cuairt air seann Mhedina, mar taginichean, obair-chriadha, bathar leathair, huqqathan agus raon farsaing de ghòlaidean ach ’s ann dhan luchd-turais ’s a tha iad uile.
hyp_text: Air a-mach air an aosta Mhadainn, tha e gu math as àbhaisteach a lorg aiteachan a' faighinn bhuapaidh de dh'bhàillidh Mharocach, mar tagines, potaichean, deilbh, chùirtichean, agus speactran fada de dh'fhàinneagan, ach 's e gu math airson nan tòraidhean.

src_text: In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre.

src_text: You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.
ref_text: S urrainn dhut boda-boda (tagsaidh motar-rothair) a chleachdadh airson siubhal am broinn Goma. ’S e ~500 Francs na Congo a’ phrìs àbhaisteach (ionadail) airson rathad goirid.
hyp_text: Tha thu air a dèanamh na boda-boda (tacsaidhean-mòr-cuairt) airson a dhol a-mach air Goma. Tha an prìcean stèidh (locair) ~500 Franga Congoiliseach airson an turas beag.

ref_text: Tha Pàirc Nàiseanta Kruger (KNP) suidhichte an ceann an ear-thuath Afraga a Deas. Tha i a’ cumail crìoch ri Mosambìog san taobh an ear, ris an t-Sìombab san taobh a tuath agus ri Abhainn Crocodile san taobh a deas.

src_text: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.
ref_text: B’ iad na Guaraní am buidheann tùsanach as cudromaiche sna ceàrnaidhean far a bheil taobh an ear Pharaguaidh an-diugh, a’ tighinn beò mar shealgairean leth-iniltearach a bha ri tuathanachas bith-beò cuideachd.
hyp_text: Bha na Guaraní na grunnan as motha a' fhearainn a' fuadar a tha an-diugh ann an Paraguaidh an Ear, a' fuireach mar luchd-tiomnach a bhith airson a' bhaile, a' dèanamh a' mhor a' mhor a' feitheamh a' bhliadhnaichean a' dol a-steach a' feitheamh a' bhliadhnaichean a' dol a-steach.

src_text: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
ref_text: Nì casinothan oidhirpean mòra mar is trice airson an t-àm is an t-airgead a chosgas aoighean a chur am meud. Chan eil uinneagan no cleocan ann mar is trice agus faodaidh gum bi e doirbh doras a-mach a lorg.
hyp_text: Tha casinos a' dol a h-uile a-mach gu bheil eòlas air a bhith a' cumail gu mòr am fàs agus an airgead a chleachdadh le luchd-tadhail. Tha fàinneagan agus clogaichean a' fàgail gu tric, agus dòchasaidh a' fàgail a bhith gu math tric a chòrdadh.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach."}

src_text: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
ref_text: Gheibhear deoch-làidir ann an cuid a dh’àitichean saor ’s an-asgaidh. Ge-tà, tha droch bhuaidh aig a’ mhisg air a’ chomas bhreithneachaidh agus tha fios aig gach cearraiche dè cho cudromach ’s a tha e a bhith stuama.
hyp_text: Tha cuid de dh'fhearainn a' tabhann deoch-uidhe air a' chùirt. Chan eil, tha sòiseachd a' sàile, is tha a h-uile duine math a' tuigsinn an àrd-ùrlar a thaobh a bhith air a' chùirt a' dol air a' chùirt.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an."}

src_text: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
ref_text: Nuair a thilleas tu dhachaigh an dèidh a bhith a’ fuireach ann an dùthaich chèin, tha thu air freagradh ris a’ chultar ùr agus cuid de chleachdaidhean na dachaigh a chall.
hyp_text: Nuair a thèid thu dhan dachaidh às a bheil thu a' fuireach an àite eile, tha thu air a dhèanamh àmòra don chultar òrtha agus cha do chuir thu air ais cuid de do chleachdaichean bho chultar dachaidh.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "A dh’aindeoin sin, tha aig luchd-labhairt Frangais na Beilge is na h-Eilbheis aig a bheil Fraingis ri Fraingis stannardach ionnsachadh san sgoil, is mar sin tha e comasach dhaibh a bhith gad thuigsinn fiù ’s ged a bhiodh tu a’ cleachdadh siostam àireamhachaidh stannardach na Frainge."}

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Thar nan linntean, tha daoine air uchdan a thogail gu faiceallach air a’ chruth-tìre gharbh chas suas ris na bearraidhean a tha mu choinneamh na mara."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Chaidh 800 mìle de shiostam loidhne-phìoba Trans-Alaska a dhùnadh nuair a sgaoil na mìltean de bharaillean olaidh amh deas air Fairbanks an Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Bha cuid de na h-àiteachan a tha anns a’ Bheilg san latha an-diugh nam pàirt de Lugsamburg san àm a dh’fhalbh ach bha iad nam pàirtean den Bheilg às dèidh Ar a-mach na Beilge anns na 1830an."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Scottish Gaelic]: {"translation": "Bho chaidh The Onion a stèidheachadh, tha e air fàs gu bhith na ìmpireachd de dh’aoir mu na naidheachdan, le tionndadh clò agus làrach-lìn a chleachd 5,000,000 neach-tadhail fa leth san Dàmhair, sanasan pearsanta, lìonra naidheachdan 24 uair, pod-chraolaidhean, agus mapa cruinne a chaidh a chur air bhog bho chionn ghoirid ris an canar Ar Saoghal Gòrach."}

src_text: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
ref_text: Bidh beanntan an Rubha an seo a’ tighinn còmhla san àrd-chlàr, agus an uair sin a’ tighinn am bàrr a-rithist gus an sreath Beanntan Ellsworth a dhèanamh a tha 360 km a dh’fhaid ’s ga sgaradh na dha leth le eigh-shruth Minnesota.
hyp_text: Tha a’ Mhonadh a’ Chinn-ghealainn an seo a’ fàs a dh’fhàgail ann an t-samhraidh, an-dèan e a dh’fhaodas a dh’fhàgail a’ chraobh 360km de na Mhonadh Ellsworth, a’ fàgail a’ Ghleann-mhòr Minnisòta.
